trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 提供有关数据<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown"></xref>或<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: A KeyEventArgs, which specifies the key the user pressed and whether any modifier keys (CTRL, ALT, and SHIFT) were pressed at the same time, is passed with each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp> event.
trans-unit.target: KeyEventArgs，它与每个指定的密钥，用户按下和是否任何修改键 （CTRL、 ALT 和 SHIFT） 已按下一次传递<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown> event occurs when the user presses any key.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown>事件发生在用户按任意键时。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp> event occurs when the user releases the key.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp>当用户释放键时发生的事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp>

trans-unit.source: Duplicate <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown> events occur each time the key repeats, if the key is held down, but only one <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp> event is generated when the user releases the key.
trans-unit.target: 重复<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown>事件发生密钥重复发生，每次，如果按住键，但只有一个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp>用户释放键时，生成事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress> event also occurs when a key is pressed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress>按下某个键时，也会发生事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs> is passed with each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress> event, and specifies the character that was composed as a result of each key press.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs>传递与每个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress>事件，并指定由于每次按键组成的字符。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: For information about the event model, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关事件模型的信息，请参阅[事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"></xref> representing the key that was pressed, combined with any modifier flags that indicate which CTRL, SHIFT, and ALT keys were pressed at the same time.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"> </xref>表示曾按下的键相结合任何修饰符标志，指示哪些 CTRL、 SHIFT 和 ALT 键已按下一次。

trans-unit.source: Possible values are obtained be applying the bitwise OR (|) operator to constants from the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"></xref> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 获得可能的值在应用的按位 OR (|) 运算符以从常量<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"></xref>枚举。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the ALT key was pressed.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否曾按下 ALT 键。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the ALT key was pressed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果曾按下 ALT 键;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the CTRL key was pressed.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否曾按下 CTRL 键。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the CTRL key was pressed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果曾按下 CTRL 键;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the event was handled.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否处理过此事件。

trans-unit.source: Handled is implemented differently by different controls within Windows Forms.
trans-unit.target: 处理由 Windows 窗体中的其他控件以不同方式实现。

trans-unit.source: For controls like <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> which subclass native Win32 controls, it is interpreted to mean that the key message should not be passed to the underlying native control.
trans-unit.target: 等控件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>哪些子类本机 Win32 控制，它被解释为表示不应将键的消息传递到基础本机控件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: If you set `Handled` to true on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>, that control will not pass the key press `events` to the underlying Win32 text box control, but it will still display the characters that the user typed.
trans-unit.target: 如果你设置`Handled`为 true 的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>，控件不会传递键按键`events`给基础 Win32 文本框控件，但它仍将显示用户输入的字符。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: If you want to prevent the current control from receiving a key press, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs.SuppressKeyPress%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要防止当前控件接收键按键，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs.SuppressKeyPress%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs.SuppressKeyPress%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to bypass the control's default handling; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to also pass the event along to the default control handler.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要绕过该控件的默认处理;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>还将沿事件传递给默认控件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: Gets the keyboard code for a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 获取键盘代码<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown"></xref>或<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"></xref> value that is the key code for the event.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"> </xref>是事件的键代码的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the key data for a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 获取的密钥数据<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown"></xref>或<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: You can use constants from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys> to extract information from the KeyData property.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用从常量<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys>以从 KeyData 属性中提取信息。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys>

trans-unit.source: Use the bitwise AND operator to compare data returned by KeyData with constants in <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys> to obtain information about which keys the user pressed.
trans-unit.target: 使用按位 AND 运算符来比较 KeyData 含常量的返回数据<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys>以获取有关哪些密钥用户按下的信息。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys>

trans-unit.source: To determine whether a specific modifier key was pressed, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs.Control%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs.Shift%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs.Alt%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 若要确定特定的修改键是否曾按下，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs.Control%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs.Shift%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs.Alt%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs.Alt%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs.Shift%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs.Control%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"></xref> representing the key code for the key that was pressed, combined with modifier flags that indicate which combination of CTRL, SHIFT, and ALT keys was pressed at the same time.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"> </xref>表示已按下的键的键代码结合修饰符标志，指示在同一时间按下 CTRL、 SHIFT 和 ALT 键的组合。

trans-unit.source: Gets the keyboard value for a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 获取键盘值<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown"></xref>或<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: The integer representation of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs.KeyCode*> property.
trans-unit.target: 整数表示形式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs.KeyCode*>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs.KeyCode*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the modifier flags for a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 获取的修饰符标志<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown"></xref>或<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: The flags indicate which combination of CTRL, SHIFT, and ALT keys was pressed.
trans-unit.target: 标志指示按下 CTRL、 SHIFT 和 ALT 键的组合。

trans-unit.source: To determine whether a specific modifier key was pressed, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs.Control%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs.Shift%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs.Alt%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 若要确定特定的修改键是否曾按下，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs.Control%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs.Shift%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs.Alt%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs.Alt%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs.Shift%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs.Control%2A>

trans-unit.source: Modifier flags can be combined with bitwise OR.
trans-unit.target: 可以与组合修饰符标志位或。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"></xref> value representing one or more modifier flags.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"> </xref>值，该值表示一个或多个修饰符标志。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the SHIFT key was pressed.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否曾按下 SHIFT 键。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the SHIFT key was pressed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果曾按下 SHIFT 键;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the key event should be passed on to the underlying control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示键事件应传递到基础控件。

trans-unit.source: You can assign `true` to this property in an event handler such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown> in order to prevent user input.
trans-unit.target: 你可以分配`true`如事件处理程序中为此属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown>为了防止用户输入。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown>

trans-unit.source: Setting SuppressKeyPress to `true` also sets <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs.Handled%2A> to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 设置为 SuppressKeyPress`true`还设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs.Handled%2A>到`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs.Handled%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the key event should not be sent to the control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果键事件不应发送到控件;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。
